original: Munthe, Carl Fredrik Soldan, lektor, Vänersborg, f. 25/12/80 i Örebro av distr :chef Sven M. o. Anna Brusewitz. G. 1. 08 m. Sigrid Nydal; 2. 27 m. Margareta Sjöstrand. Barn: Gerd f. 10, V^ålborg 13, Göran 28. — Mog:ex. i Östersund 00, fik kand. i Upps. 07, fid. lic. 14, fil. dr 16, provår 16-17. Am^au. v. fys. inst. i Upps. 09-10, vik. adj. v. Gbgs latin 16, Upps. h. a. 1, 17-18, lektor i mat em. o. fysik v. Vänersb. h. a. 1. sed. 18. Ordf. i istyr. f. A-B Fredr. Brusewitz i Limmared sed. 44. Hvitf. stip. f. fys. undersökn. v. CTI 16, 17 o. 20-21. Skr.: Undersökn. av" ol. jordarters ledn:förmåga f. värme v. olika fuktigh :hal’t (belönad m. VS Linné-pris 15), Die innere Wärmeieitungs-fähigkeit von Bodenarten bei verscli. Feuchtigkeitshalt (grad:avh.). Hobby: musik. RNO,
translated: Munthe, Carl Fredrik Soldan, lecturer, Vänersborg, b. 25/12/80 in Örebro to district manager Sven M. and Anna Brusewitz. Married 1st in 1908 to Sigrid Nydal; 2nd in 1927 to Margareta Sjöstrand. Children: Gerd b. 1910, Välborg b. 1913, Göran b. 1928. Completed secondary school in Östersund in 1900, obtained a bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1907, a licentiate degree in 1914, a PhD in 1916, probationary year 1916-1917. Assistant at the Physics Institute in Uppsala from 1909-1910, temporary adjutant at Gothenburg Latin School in 1916, at Uppsala Secondary School from 1917-1918, emeritus lecturer in mathematics and physics at Vänersborg Secondary School since 1918. Chairman of the board of A-B Fredr. Brusewitz in Limmared since 1944. Received a scholarship for physical research from the CTI in 1916, 1917, and 1920-1921. Writings: Investigation of the thermal conductivity of different soil types at various moisture levels (awarded with the VS Linné Prize in 1915), The internal heat conductivity of soil types at different moisture levels (degree: dependent). Hobby: music. RNO (Royal Nobleman's Order).

profession.namedPosition: Mathematics and Physics, Vänersborg Secondary School
